alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascade Foothills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 3:52PM PST until December 16 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM WEDNESDAY TO 4 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...South Washington Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...From 4 AM Wednesday to 4 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow will occur across the highest elevations of the south Washington Cascade Foothills.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
